== Steps ==

{{{
svn checkout https://java-market-data.googlecode.com/svn/trunk java-market-data
*mvn package*
cd target directory
java -jar *eod.X.X.X*
}}}

 * svn checkout https://java-market-data.googlecode.com/svn/trunk java-market-data
 * *mvn package* 
 * cd target directory
 * java -jar *eod-X.X.X.jar*

== In NetBeans == 

 * Add *exec.classpathScope=compile* to the "Run Project" Action of the used Maven profile in NetBeans
